meanings.definition: A person who adheres strictly to prescribed forms or rules.
meanings.sent1: The formalist always follows the rules when playing games.
meanings.sent2: The artist was known as a formalist because he followed all the guidelines in his paintings.
meanings.sent3: The formalist decided to organize a formal event with strict dress codes and protocols.
meanings.sent4: She was a formalist in her approach to gardening, meticulously following the planting instructions.
meanings.sent5: The formalist's dedication to following rules made him a reliable team player.

meanings.sent1: The formalist approach to art focuses on following established techniques.
meanings.sent2: Her formalist style of writing was praised for its adherence to traditional structures.
meanings.sent3: The formalist cat insisted on sitting in the same spot every day, following a strict routine.
meanings.sent4: His formalist attitude towards work meant he always completed tasks in a systematic manner.
meanings.sent5: The formalist design of the building emphasized clean lines and symmetry.
